website_summaries.verdict: Dependable freshness from a trusted brand. Great if you like the idea of being able to control the strength of your car’s air freshener.
pros: Actively combats odors with Odor Clear Technology
Simultaneously eliminates odors and releases a pleasing fragrance
Pack of 4 offers 2 different scents for variety
Easy to attach to air vents
Dial allows you to adjust scent intensity
Lasts up to 30 days with moderate use
cons: Some users felt that the freshener ran out too fast

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased and started to use this, the smell in my car would prevent others from wanting to ride in it. I would always have my windows open trying to just get a fresh breeze, it would be painful when to humid or too cold to have the windows open. As soon as I purchased and started to use the car fresheners I started to drive with my windows closed all of the time and now I am the main driver for everyone. I highly suggest this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wills

customer_reviews.title: New car smell
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put in my car and the scent was strong enough to make my car smell brand new. The fresh scent was amazing considering all the bad smells from sports equipment and pets it was able to cover
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Don't use too much heat.
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed these die much faster when the heater is on. My car smells wonderful when my ac or heater is actually on. I'm not sure if they really do last 30 days, because the first two I bought at a store leaked all over my dashboard.... So far, no leaks. I'm pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AussieG

customer_reviews.title: Works well...maybe a little too well!
customer_reviews.text: These are great so far. I've use a few other random products that seem to last a lot longer, but were less effective. In terms of effectiveness, these are strong, seems accurate that they not only freshen the car up, but actually eliminate/suppress odors. The little lever/fan louver to control intensity does not really have an off position, even when closed completely it's basically...fairly strong. Open all the way, VERY strong...it's like somebody doused you and the car with half a bottle of fabreze kinda strong. Not so much a complaint because the scents are quite good, but subtle and controllable...these are not. Even with the fans on low in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Well_Poet

customer_reviews.title: One of the best auto odor fresheners on the market!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little pricey compared to the competition, but they last far longer. Plus, like any Febreeze products, the smell is soft and nullifies other odors. I appreciate not having to swap it out every week (I get at least a month out of one) so the extra cost is well worth it to me. I like the multipack to save a little bit then my wife steals some from me for her car because of how well they work. Great product that does what it advertises! Nice, fresh, clean fragrance every time I open my car door.
customer_reviews.author: Jared - Colorado Springs

customer_reviews.title: Smells really good
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but doesn't last as long as I would have hoped. A little over a week and that's without heat or air blowing. However I still buy them because they smell so good!
customer_reviews.author: ChristiTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Febreeze Car Air Freshener
customer_reviews.text: The linen and sky doesn't seem to hold the scent well at all this far. The other one has worked better and can still actually smell it a couple of weeks later. Install is super easy, just clip of and go. Price was better than elsewhere but can't really say I love these.
customer_reviews.author: McLovin

customer_reviews.title: Okay but overrated
customer_reviews.text: My car has some smell and I was looking for some car freshers to cover the smell. I bought this FeBreze car freshers combo and it is somewhat disappointing. I don’t really like the ‘Linen Sky’ because it smelled cheap laundry detergent. The installation is easy. The smells were strong but won’t last at after 2 weeks. To me it is overpriced and overrated
customer_reviews.author: EnjoyLife

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I hate the smell my car gets when I get fast food so I needed something to block out the hideous smell. It smells good and it isn't that overpowering. The bad part is that it only lasts maybe 2-3 weeks. Which isn't bad considering you get 4 which can last a few months.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Toth

customer_reviews.title: More uses than you could imagine
customer_reviews.text: Helpful hint: if you have a hood over your oven that doesn’t vent to the outside you can attach one of theses suckers to the exhaust vent. This is very effective while frying, broiling fish or anything that leaves an annoying odor.
customer_reviews.author: No kidding

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The linen freshener really smells like laundry or a laundromat. Initially a good smell but over time becomes overwhelming
customer_reviews.author: Treadmill Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing sent and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh! No more stinky dog smell in my car! This has a pleasant smell you can easily adjust the amount of sent being released and it seems to last. Just clip it on one of your events in Volia!
customer_reviews.author: amanda randall

customer_reviews.title: Knock off or really really old. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a knock off or really really old. I tried all four and had to throw them out after 5 minutes because of the stench. Went to the store and bought the same ones and it’s 100 percent a different smell. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for car fresheners
customer_reviews.text: The price for these was about $2.50 each with this deal. The Hawaiian scent is refreshing and not overpowering. I put he scent on the lowest setting and it has lasted about 40 days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: short duration
customer_reviews.text: First the smell is very basic, and it lasts about a week and then very little could smell. I do not recommend it for those who like to have their car scented for a long time. Lasts very little and smell normal
customer_reviews.author: Miguel j.

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong scent!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product. If you have a sensitive nose the Very Strong scent will irritate your nose. I keep it closed and the fragrance remains noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I think these were a bad batch. I’ve bought them before and they work pretty great. They were on sale so I bought these form amazon, and they drain very quickly without a lot of scent output.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Found these didnt give off scent
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, these clever little gadgets don't give off scent. I expected my car to smell like heaven everytime I used it, but for some reason the scent doesn't flow from the device.
customer_reviews.author: Succinct Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this one. I have an old car so the smell of the air conditioner is not very good, I need to use the air fresher to fresh. Those are good choices.
customer_reviews.author: Changpeng Tong

customer_reviews.title: Best deal I've seen for bulk fresheners
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of buying these individually at Target. I bought these and keep them stashed in the glove compartment so my car is always smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie C

customer_reviews.title: great scents
customer_reviews.text: mix one of each scent and it's a perfect combo; however, they are starting to last less than 30 days depending on the level you blow air from your vents
customer_reviews.author: Kewi

customer_reviews.title: Very less scent
customer_reviews.text: its says 1for month bt its gone with in 3days. Scent is not good. Basically you dont feel it. Waste of money

customer_reviews.title: Last long!!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal love them in my car last long Awesome smell fast shipping thanks Amazon🚗😇😍

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I don't drive very much so I don't know how long it will last.

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, and the price is good, the only negative point is the scent.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The Hawaiian scent smells like a bathroom, the blue ones much much better

customer_reviews.title: This is a must cop!
customer_reviews.text: These will last you forever! Highly recommend buying a couple packs

customer_reviews.title: I L♡VE FEBREEZE Products!!
customer_reviews.text: I L♡VE Febreeze! I just can't say it enough!! I use FEBREEZE products in my laundry i use FEBREEZE products in my candle warmers too!!

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Covers smoke smell well. Doesnt last as long as stated.
customer_reviews.author: j rez

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good.
customer_reviews.text: Strong at first and then its wonderful. Makes you carpet in your vehicle smell fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Annie S.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: As expected , I love the blue scent more But it’s great for the car, will last about 2-3wks
customer_reviews.author: Susan Salameh

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic product that is super easy to use and freshens up your car in no time. I used these in my car and the odor was gone almost immediately. I would highly recommend this for getting rid of any unwanted odors.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Scent is too strong!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is too strong, even at the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't take the smell
customer_reviews.text: Something about the chemistry of these things made me kind of sick so I couldn't use them. The Hawaiian one was worse than the linen.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Scent doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Smells super great but only last for a couple days. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rose

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love both of the smells. Bought on a lightening deal during prime day
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: They leave your car smelling wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Love these car fresheners. They will last you close to the 30 days if you keep it on the lowest setting. I tend to keep it at the halfway mark and its last me about 3 weeks. Even when they're empty they keep their scent.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: They work well just like any other one I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It okay but loses its scent in about two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Says you get 4, I only received 2
customer_reviews.text: Beware, says you get 4 air fresheners, 2 Hawaiian and 2 linen/sky. I only received 2 linen/sky.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Goff

customer_reviews.title: Can’t smell them in my car :/
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I install it wrong (not sure how that’s possible lol) or got a defective batch, but unless I’m extremely close to it, I can’t smell anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last as long as it says, by week one it was almost empty. Idk if I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Car freshener that actually makes ur car smell good
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product but I am impressed, I've had it for about a week and every time I get in my car it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Get these
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the best value I saw online and includes scents that most people would agree are pleasant. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darby Clower

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Has a small dial to adjust the amount of scent.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Barely scented.
customer_reviews.text: Barely had any scent at all compared to the ones I have purchased locally in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Can't contact support
customer_reviews.text: CHECK EACH ONE BEFORE OPENING SO YOU CAN RETURN IT! I've been trying to contact support for days now and no response. As you can see, the right one has significantly less than the left. Make sure you check your things is all I'm saying.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Last for a short while
customer_reviews.text: Good air freshener the only bad thing about them is that they last a short while. I put one on about a week ago and the liquid inside it its almost gone, even when you put to where it only dispenses a little. But in overall the smell of them are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell on both flavors - would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The "Hawaii" smell is more akin to sunscreen, and the "Linen" smell is exactly the same as the one used in airplane bathrooms. The smell is overwhelming and difficult to get out of my car. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great scents, but didnt last long, even on the lowest setting
customer_reviews.author: DuckJ13

customer_reviews.title: Car smells fresh
customer_reviews.text: Smell great. Don’t seem to last as long as they say but they are good
customer_reviews.author: william carroll

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in, but barely makes any difference, and the clean linen and island scents aren’t that great any ways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell is WAY too strong
customer_reviews.text: Even on the "lowest" setting, these things give off so much scent, it felt like I was choking on the Hawaiian one. Took it out of my car after like 3 days cause it was bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great smeel typically last 3 weeks per freshener with Great Smell.

customer_reviews.title: Not smelly enough

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smell!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scents and it has now lasted longer than 30 days.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got a lot of compliments because of this bad boy aww yeah getting these again for sure!

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 out of the 4 air fresheners arrived.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to communicate with them but they don't have a support phone number and the link to the support page was not working.

customer_reviews.title: No fragrance in car!
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel any fragrance in my car when i use it.

customer_reviews.text: Not a month as mentioned in the description. I used the lowest level of vent.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value , smell really great and the price is right

customer_reviews.title: Bad shopping experience

customer_reviews.title: Has a leak
customer_reviews.text: These products as leak its goes fast but the smell is good

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the car smells with this product

customer_reviews.title: It kills bad odor
customer_reviews.text: I use it so my car don’t smell like smoke works 100%

customer_reviews.title: Half filled
customer_reviews.text: Two of them were only half filled. I did not expect this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good in my car. The dog smell is gone
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Freshner!
customer_reviews.text: I usually get these from Costco since you get also get a multipack. However, it is only the Linen scent and I wanted the Hawaiian Aloha scent! These are the best and so easy to use. They last a while (shorter when it's hot out and bakes the fragrance liquid) and gives some life to my older car!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: No island scent
customer_reviews.text: The linen scent worked great. Each unit lasted for about a month, leaving a pleasant scent in the vehicle. The island scent however, had no smell at all. It did contain liquid which evaporated over the month but no scent was ever detected.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh smell I get in my car when using the Fabreze air freshener. They seem to last a fairly long time except in the dead of summer. They do tend to dry up a bit faster, but still last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a scent at all
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could’ve given these more stars because I love these scents in the spray. These do not give off any scent when heat isn’t blowing through them. I could have my A/C of full blast (enough to blow my hair back) and I can still barely smell these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, a fresh scent for your car. Able to adjust the amount of scent coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Febreze Car Air Freshener
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I keep them on the lowest setting and put them in the back of my SUV (I have a air vent back there too). The smell is not overwhelming and they do the trick to give the car a nice light fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seems like some of the liquid was quite a bit lower in quantity then just buying at a store
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Devoux

customer_reviews.title: Like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what they are suppose to be. The little clip-on vent air vent car smelly thing is what these are. There’s two scents and tahdah your car smells like a tropical drink.
customer_reviews.author: ~misslaurap

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Lasts decently well for about a month. I also use it at home - just place them at the heating/air vents. Freshens the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Just wish these stupid things were A) filled up more than 3/8ths when new, and B) didn't cost so d**m much!!! They do lost last long at all, especially in the summer.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.(
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this item . I couldn’t go wrong as a gift to my son who loves for his car to smell awesome as these do. Great gift idea.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i ordered. Smells great and a great buy. Clips right onto a/c vent

customer_reviews.text: Great price! Love these air fresheners! They leave my car smelling amazing!!!

product_meta.title: Febreze Car Air Freshener Vent Clips, 2 Linen & Sky and 2 Hawaiian Aloha Scents, Odor Eliminator, 4 Count
product_meta.description: Febreze CAR cleans away vehicle odors with Odor Clear Technology so they're gone for good. Simply attach this car air freshener to the air vent to begin cleaning your car of odors and slowly release a light, fresh scent for up to 30 days. The scent dial puts you in the driver's seat, allowing you to select the perfect amount of freshness for you and your passengers. Don't give odors a ride. Eliminate them with Febreze CAR. On low and under ambient conditions.
feature_bullets: Doesn't just mask, cleans away odors with Odor Clear Technology
Febreze CAR cleans away odors and slowly releases a light, fresh scent for up to 30 days on low and under ambient conditions
Attaches easily to car vent and allows you to select the level of intensity to control how much freshness is released
A lush, tropical Hawaiian Aloha scent
